title.en: Creepy Pharmacist: All My Patients are Horrific

altTitles.zh: 诡异药剂师：我的病人皆为恐怖

altTitles.zh-ro: Guiyi Yaoji Shi: Wo De Bingren Jie Wei Kongbu

description.en:
Will this treacherous darkness swallow you up, or will you survive as a unique existence? 

Lin En accidentally transmigrated into this monstrous world. As a rare human doctor, every one of his patients was moved by his "gentle" treatment and "sincere" service! 

“Anesthetics? Maybe next time."
"My knife is quick, it’ll be over soon~"

Welcome to Bloodsaw Pharmacy, where we will serve you wholeheartedly.

altTitles.en: MARRIAGETOXIN

description.en:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…

------
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

title.en: I Fell Into a Reverse Harem Game!

altTitles.ko-ro: Yeok Harem Game Sogeuro Tteoreojin Moyangimnida

altTitles.en: It Looks Like I've Fallen into the World of a Reverse Harem Game
It Seems Like I Fell Into a Reverse Harem Game

altTitles.fr: Je suis tombée dans un jeu de harem inversé!

altTitles.pt-br: Estou dentro de um jogo de harém inverso

altTitles.uk: Здається я потрапила в світ гри гаремника

altTitles.ja: 逆ハーレムゲームの中に落ちたようです

altTitles.ja-ro: Gyaku Harem Game no Naka ni Ochitayou desu

altTitles.th: เมื่อฉันกลายเป็นตัวร้ายในเกมจีบหนุ่ม

description.en:
Reset, and game set.

When I opened my eyes, I was in a different world. I had become the game's villainous princess who was feared by all. Not to mention… Completely naked men I didn't even know were approaching me left and right!

“Are you cold? Shall I warm you up with a hug?”

“Oh? Have you not had enough yet?”

Seriously, what’s up with this situation? And just how the hell am I going to get out of this freaking game?!

---
I woke up in a strange bed, with not just one, but two lovers beside me! In this game of love, affection, and deception, I’m Elvia, the Imperial Princess, with a gaggle of men vying for my favor. Sounds great, right? Except this means I'm also stuck as the villainess while the main character is my manipulative maid, Arielle! She’s out to bring me down, and she’s got plans for my harem of men. But I know all her secrets, because I can see her player notifications. Can I beat her at her own game?

---
**Original Novel:**
* Chapters: [Boomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/Game_set), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/52298103)
* eBook: [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5370400), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/793012528)
* [Official English Translation](https://radishfiction.com/stories/21138)

**Original Webtoon:**

**Official Translations:**

* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语 (R15)](https://www.podoteng.com/)

* [Japanese / 日本語 (R15)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/54742)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย (R15)](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B8%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1/133)
description.fr:
Dur, dur de se retrouver coincée dans le corps d’une psychopathe vicieuse haïe de tous! Surtout lorsqu’elle se révèle être la méchante d’un jeu vidéo de drague, destinée à mourir de mort violente. Une seule solution pour survivre: opérer un virage à 180 degrés: remettre de l’ordre dans l’empire, libérer les esclaves de l'ancienne princesse et changer son image auprès de tous. Mais c’est sans compter les ambitions de l’héroïne du jeu, bien décidée à massacrer sa rivale.

---
**Original Novel:**
* Chapters: [Boomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/Game_set), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/52298103)

* [Official English Translation](https://radishfiction.com/stories/21138)

title.en: The Saga of Tanya the Evil

altTitles.de: Die Militärischen Aufzeichnungen eines kleinen Mädchens

altTitles.th: บันทึกสงคราม ของยัยเผด็จการ

altTitles.es: Crónicas de una niña en guerra

altTitles.it: La saga di Tanya la malvagia
Le cronache militari di una ragazzina

altTitles.pt: Crônicas Militares de uma Pequena Garota

altTitles.en: The Military Chronicles of a Little Girl

altTitles.es-la: La Saga de Tanya la Malvada

description.en:
A young girl fights on the frontlines in war. She has blonde hair, blue eyes, and nearly transparent white skin as she flies through the air and mercilessly strikes down her enemies. Her name is Tanya Degurechaff and speaks with a young girl's lisp while she commands the army.

Tanya used to be one of Japan's elite office workers, but because of a wrathful god was reborn as a little girl. Prioritizing optimization and career advancement above all, she will become the most dangerous entity among the Imperial Army's sorcerers.  

Adapted from Light Novel of same name.  

---

**Note:** Manga and Light Novel Licensed in English by Yen Press as "The Saga of Tanya the Evil".
description.es-la: Una joven chica que lucha en el frente de una guerra. Tiene el pelo rubio, ojos azules y una piel blanca, casi transparente, y es conocida por moverse como el viento en el campo de batalla. Ella es Tanya Degurechaff y se encarga de dirigir al ejército. Solía ser un asalariado de élite en Japón, pero debido a la ira de un dios, renació como una niña pequeña. Tanya lo da todo por avanzar en su carrera militar y se convertirá en la maga más poderosa del ejército imperial.

title.en: Kono Kaisha ni Suki na Hito ga Imasu

altTitles.ja: この会社に好きな人がいます

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Kaisha ni Suki na Hito ga Imasu

altTitles.en: I Have a Crush at Work
Can You Keep a Secret?
At This Company Is The Person I Like
The Person I Like Is At This Company
The Person I Like Works at the Same Company

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhè gōngsī yǒu wǒ xǐhuān de rén

altTitles.th: บริษัทนี้มีความรัก

description.en:
_"Why don't the two of us date? …In secret"_
 
Tateishi, who works in accounting at a snack-making company, has a secret. That secret is the existence of his cute lover that he's had since yesterday. Why keep it a secret, you ask? Because his lover is his unyielding colleague from the planning department of the same company— Mitsuya!
 
A pure office romance story about a couple who started their relationship in secret, and want to keep it that way!
description.ja: 「俺たち、付き合わない？……内緒で」お菓子メーカーの経理部に勤めるアラサー男子・立石には、秘密があった。それは、昨日できたばかりの、かわいい恋人の存在。なぜなら相手は、同じ会社の企画部で働く勝気な同期女子・三ツ谷だから――！　してないひとも、あこがれてるひとも、迷惑してるひとも、きっと言いたいことがある。ちょっとは覗いてみたくなる。秘密厳守のピュア社内恋愛ストーリー！
description.pt-br:
"Por que nós dois não namoramos? ... Em segredo"
  
Tateishi, que trabalha na contabilidade de uma empresa que faz lanches, tem um segredo. Esse segredo é a existência de sua amante fofa que ele teve desde ontem. Por que manter isso em segredo, você pergunta? Porque sua amante é sua colega inflexível do departamento de planejamento da mesma empresa - Mitsuya!
  
Uma história de puro romance de escritório sobre um casal que começou seu relacionamento em segredo e quer mantê-lo assim!

altTitles.en: Rainbows After Storms

description.en: Unbeknownst to their friends and classmates, Nanoha and Chidori are dating. Watch as they try to keep their relationship secret!
description.es: A las espaldas de sus amigas y compañeras the salón, Nanoha y Chidori están saliendo juntas. ¡Velas tratando de mantener su relación en secreto!

description.en:
An office worker named Komari is saved from a monster by a mysterious vampire named Liberta.
Sex and violence ensues.

Vampire yuri action from the creator of Tadokoro-san.

altTitles.en: One-Eyed Wolf in the Sahara

description.en:
A black eagle who was a slave trader on the outskirts of an oasis.
Ingle, a reticent one-eyed man who worked as a mercenary by his side.
He hated to the point of wanting to kill the shaman who killed the father of the black eagle, and he
was looking for an opportunity for revenge.
Then, after hearing the information from the shaman, Ingle joined the revenge of the water merchants.
However, in the course of the raid, a man named Bak, who likes him, is seriously injured, and is forced to
choose between revenge or rescue... .
description.es-la:
En el desierto (país de arena); Loki, Thor e Ingul tienen una relación complicada como antiguo amo y antiguo esclavo, pero se quieren como amigos de infancia y familia. Sin embargo, Byak que está enamorado de Ingul, no está contento con la fuerte relación de los tres.
Byak, quiere que le presten atención de cierta manera, pero no puede ser honesto con ellos; por alguna razón, él termina siendo cómplice con Ingul...

"Esta es la historia de un lobo que nunca ha conocido el amor y una serpiente que se enamora de él profundamente".

description.en: The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!

altTitles.ja: 王子が私をあきらめない！

description.en: Once upon a time there was a wonderful prince… A super rich and handsome prince with a genius IQ of 500, extraordinary physical prowess… An outrageously overpowered super star…!! What will happen when this ridiculously overpowered ultra-high spec boy and a certain ultra-level-headed ordinary girl meet…?!
description.pt-br: Era uma vez um príncipe maravilhoso... Um príncipe super rico e lindo, com um QI de 500, um gênio, com destreza física extraordinária... Uma super estrela escandalosamente dominada...!! O que vai acontecer quando este ridiculamente ultradominado garoto e uma garota super medíocre se encontram...?!

altTitles.en: Muscle Man
M.U.S.C.L.E

description.en:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

altTitles.en: Super! I'll Make A Habit Of It ♡

description.en: ☆ I, Shiratori Nagisa, have a secret that I can't tell anyone. That is, pretending to be a boy and going to a normal junior high school ♡ The popular "I'll Make A Habit Of It ♡" reappears with even more power!!
description.ja: ☆あたし, 白鳥なぎさには、だれにもいえないヒミツがあるの。 それは, 男の子のフリをして,フツーの中学校に通っていること♡大人気の「くせになりそう♡」が,さらにパワーアップして,再登場!!

altTitles.en: Tea Time For Dreaming Maids
Dreaming Maid's Tea Time

altTitles.ja: 夢見るメイドのティータイム

description.en:
In the spring of her second year of high school, Fuyuka Yukinoshita starts working part-time at a maid cafe. She dreams of becoming someone who can make people smile, like the manager she admired, but she is always getting flustered by her idiosyncratic co-workers!

It is the magic that makes you smile. A fluffy and sweet moment.
description.es:
En la primavera de su segundo año de instituto, Fuyuka Yukinoshita empieza a trabajar a tiempo parcial en una cafetería. Sueña con convertirse en alguien capaz de hacer sonreír a la gente, como la encargada a la que admiraba, pero sus idiosincrásicas compañeras de trabajo siempre la ponen nerviosa.

Es la magia que te hace sonreír. Un momento esponjoso y dulce.
description.ja:
高校二年の春。メイド喫茶でアルバイトを始めた雪ノ下冬花。
憧れの店長のように誰かを笑顔にできる人になりたいという夢を抱くが、個性的な同僚たちに振り回されて!?
それはあなたを笑顔にする魔法☆ ふわふわで甘々なひと時を♪
description.es-la:
En la primavera de su segundo año de instituto, Fuyuka Yukinoshita empieza a trabajar a tiempo parcial en una cafetería. Sueña con convertirse en alguien capaz de hacer sonreír a la gente, como la encargada a la que admiraba, pero sus idiosincrásicas compañeras de trabajo siempre la ponen nerviosa.

Es la magia que te hace sonreír. Un momento esponjoso y dulce.

altTitles.en: Terror

description.en:
Following the life of the student newspaper reporter Emiko, these are scary stories of experiences from Miyako High School :  
- Ubawareta Shinzou (Stolen Heart) – The school's mystery club sees the dangerous consequences of an innocent promise concerning heart donation after death between two friends.   
- Kyuuketsu Men (Bloodsucking Mask) – A girl who wears a demon mask from a shrine for a bad-luck-banishing drama club party ends up unable to remove it.   
- Dokuga (Poison Moth) – The science club leader creates a serum to preserve dead bodies perfectly, but it may have other unpredicted side effects.   
- Henshitsu – A couple take shelter from a storm in a strange house with a secret that might prove to be deadly.   
– These stories and many more are found in the two volumes of Kyoufu. [tethysdust]

altTitles.en: The Emperor Napoleon

altTitles.th: นโปเลียน ยอดนักรัก

altTitles.ja: 栄光のナポレオン - エロイカ

description.en:
The direct sequel to Rose of Versailles.

It tells the story of Napoleon's empire, including the Thermidorian Reaction, the Italian Campaign, the Syrian Campaign, the Battle of the Nile and the coup of 18 Brumaire, and the French invasion of Russia.

title.en: Ikenie ni Natta Ore ga Nazeka Jashin wo Horoboshite Shimatta Ken

altTitles.ja: 生贄になった俺が、なぜか邪神を滅ぼしてしまった件

altTitles.en: I, the Sacrifice, Somehow Killed the Evil God

description.en: Elt sacrificed himself to the evil god in place of his childhood friend. He was prepared to die in the face of the evil god's attack, and was supposed to meet his end...However, at that moment, his unique skill "Inventory" activates, and he finds himself turning the tables on the evil god. Surviving, Elt sets off for his home village to inform his childhood friend of his safety, but on the way, he encounters a powerful monster walking through the forest—however, as he prepares to avoid the confrontation, he spots a fainted girl right next to the creature! A royal welcome upon this world! The success fantasy starting with a sacrificial hero!
description.ja: 自ら幼馴染の身代わりに邪神への生贄となったエルト。邪神の攻撃を前に死を覚悟し、最期を迎える……はずだった。が、ユニークスキル『ストック』が発動し、気が付くと邪神を返り討ちにしていた。生還したエルトは幼馴染に無事を伝えるため、故郷の村へと旅立つことに。道中、森を歩いていると強力なモンスターに遭遇。戦闘を回避しようと考えたその時、モンスターの傍で気を失っている少女を発見し——生贄系主人公による王道成り上がりファンタジー開幕！

title.en: Salaryman Exorcist - Okumura Yukio no Aishuu

altTitles.ja-ro: Salaryman Exorcist: Okumura Yukio no Aishū

altTitles.en: Salaryman Exorcist: The Sorrows of Okumura Yukio

altTitles.ja-ro: Salaryman Futsumashi Okumura Yukio no Aishuu

altTitles.ja: サラリーマン祓魔師 奥村雪男の

description.en: A spin-off of Ao no Exorcist, following Okumura Yukio as the main protoganist.

'Cha Ju-young' is imprisoned in a juvenile detention center for rendering his gangster father comatose.
Not long after, the father, who was thought never to wake up, comes to visit...

altTitles.en: Witches Bloom Under the Full Moon

description.en: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!
description.ja: 帆高航一（ほたか　こういち）はちょっとコジラセ気味な中学2年生。そんな彼はある日、「アルストロメリアの魔女」を名乗る謎の少女・紫麻（しま）と出会い、彼女の“契約者”に選ばれる。満月の夜を舞台に繰り広げられる、恋と魔法のファンタジー！
description.zh: 帆高航一是个有点内向的初二学生。某一天，他遇到了一个神秘的女孩紫麻，她自称“阿尔斯特罗梅里亚的女巫”，并被选为她的“契约者”。 在满月之夜缔结的爱情和魔法的幻想故事！

altTitles.en: I Want to Kiss You, Too

description.en: Natsushiro Seiichi, a first year high school student who is living a smooth sailing high school life. However, his everyday life changes after he encounters a popular beauty, Miho, in the first school year!!

altTitles.en: Swaying Beside You
Trembling Next to You

description.en:
It seems like there's something about the guy from the head office?  
  
With the rumors spreading around, Shiina had to be transferred to the local office's General Affairs department. Everyday, he commutes by bus early in the morning to avoid crowds that trigger his trauma. One rainy day, he decides to go home by car with Niwa from the Development department. However, he couldn't stand it, and ended up getting a panic attack. Even so, Niwa reached out to him without hesitation. "Whenever you feel uneasy, I'll be right beside you to help."  
  
From the next morning onwards, Niwa started to take the same bus.

altTitles.en: Fuck-pect Buddy
Fuckpect Buddy

description.en: A fierce love collab at City Casual, the nations top men's magazine, between the bear-like leader of the planning team, Baik Youngchan, and the beautiful but prickly Design team lead, Seo Hyunsoo. After Seo Hyunsoo accidentally sees Baik Youngchan's naked body, he begins to question his sexual preference. What happens when Seo Hyunsoo gets involved with his office nemesis who he'd never dreamed of getting mixed up with?

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon
Skeleton Soldier

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

altTitles.en: Come on-a My House!
Kamona My House

altTitles.ja: カモナ マイ ハウス

description.en: From Lovesick Alley: Ever since she was little, Hina has always had a routine of visiting a particular vacant house. One day, she notices a stranger sleeping inside. Why is Hina so fixated on that house and who is that guy sleeping there?!

title.en: Kanojo ga Onii-chan ni Nattara Shitai 10 no Koto

altTitles.ja: 彼女がお兄ちゃんになったらしたい10のこと

altTitles.en: 10 Things I’d Want to Do if She Becomes My Big Brother

description.en: As a result of entering high school, Nanase moves into a sharehome. Only, there is a special rule that states "all the residents must be assigned a family role"!! What will happen of Nanase's life as she starts living with her pretend family...!?

altTitles.en: Tanaka-kun Is Always Listless

altTitles.ja: 田中くんはいつもけだるげ

description.en: Sighing, leaning on his elbows, sleepy eyes. Tanaka-kun is a boy that basically doesn't try but isn't disliked. This is a laid-back youth comedy about Tanaka-kun and the quiet Oota who can't leave him alone.
description.id: Mengeluh, bersandar pada lengannya, mata yang mengantuk. Tanaka-kun adalah lelaki yang dasarnya tidak ingin mencoba hal yang dia tidak suka. Ini adalah cerita komedi masa sekolah dan si pendiam Oota yang tidak bisa meninggalkan dia sendirian.
description.ru: Две абсолютно непохожие личности: Танака, способный спать 24 часа в сутки, и Оота, отличающийся от остальных своей активностью и ответственностью. Такие люди должны бесить друг друга, но, не смотря на это, они друзья. До чего доведет эта дружба? Посмотрим...
description.pt-br: Suspirando, apoiando-se nos seus cotovelos, com os olhos sonolentos. Tanaka-kun é um garoto que basicamente não faz nada, mas não é odiado. Esta é uma comédia jovem que fala sobre o Tanaka-kun e Oota, um rapaz quieto que não consegue deixá-lo sozinho

altTitles.en: The Gourmet

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.ja: おいでよ! マギカ堂書店

description.en: Madoka et al. working in a bookstore? More likely than you'd think! And their manager, Kyuubey, mistreats his employees while bootlicking his superiors (from Head Office)? Treat yourself to this light-hearted comedy with Madoka and friends hard at work in Magicado Bookstores!

title.en: Global Freeze: I Created an Apocalypse Shelter

altTitles.zh: Quan Qiu Bing Feng: Wo Dazaole Mori Anquan Wu

altTitles.en: Freezing The World: I Built A Doomsday Safehouse

altTitles.zh: Quán Qiú Bīng Fēng: Wǒ Dǎzàole Mòrì Ānquán Wū

altTitles.en: The World Is Frozen: I Built a Doomsday Safe House

altTitles.zh: 全球冰封: 我打造了末日安全屋

description.en:
The world is plunged into an icy age, and 95% of humanity is wiped out! In his previous life, our hero Zhang Yi was tragically killed by the very people he helped, thanks to his kind heart.

But fear not, for Zhang Yi has been reborn and now possesses the awesome power – space manipulation! He's gone completely bonkers hoarding supplies for the icy apocalypse and is ready to rule the frozen wasteland! He vows to unleash a hundred times the pain on those who harmed him in the past!
description.pt-br: O mundo mergulhou numa era gelada e 95% da humanidade foi exterminada! Em sua vida anterior, nosso herói Zhang Yi foi tragicamente morto pelas mesmas pessoas que ajudou, graças ao seu bom coração. Mas não tema, pois Zhang Yi renasceu e agora possui o incrível poder de manipulação do espaço! Ele ficou completamente maluco acumulando suprimentos para o apocalipse gelado e está pronto para governar o deserto congelado! Ele promete desencadear cem vezes mais dor naqueles que o prejudicaram no passado!

altTitles.en: Tomorrow, When Spring Comes.

description.en:
Having given up on both study and dreams, Meguri Sakamoto ended his lacklustre high school life. 
But, on the day of the graduation ceremony, the dissappearance of his ex-girlfriend and now famous musician Chika Nito, has been reported in the news?!
Starting with a time leap, this is a love story about redoing one's youth.

Kuno Shio, who is half human and half alien, has a "glitch" that causes his body to turn into a gel-like mass when he gets lustful.
He enjoys attracting girls who gather because of his novelty, but one day, his parents are worried about Shio, who is only interested in splattering, and transfer him to a boarding school for boys.
At the moment when Souma Minato, the class representative who was assigned to take care of Shio, hugs him, Shio somehow splatters...!?
The popular pure love comedy for youth, which was popular on LINE manga, is now a full-color comic with original illustrations!!

title.en: Heroine? Saint? No, I'm an All-Works Maid (Proud)!

altTitles.ja-ro: Heroine? Seijo? Iie, All Works Maid desu (ko)! @COMIC

altTitles.ja: ヒロイン？聖女？いいえ、オールワークスメイドです（誇）！＠COMIC

altTitles.en: Heroine? Saint? No, I'm the "Almighty Maid" (Pride)!

description.en:
“I’ll become the greatest maid in the world!”

With her black-and-white skirt fluttering in the wind, a girl declares her vow. Her name is Melody. The girl, a reincarnator of Japanese origin, inherited the dream of her past life and began working as the maid of a ruined count household in the Kingdom of Theolas. She can transform cheap black tea into a top-shelf drink as easily as she can quickly upgrade a ruined estate into a newly-finished mansion. From household cleaning to serving meals, hunting game to DIY construction, just leave everything to me! Anything’s possible with the help of all-powerful magic!

Truthfully, this is actually the world of an otome game, and the superpowered, omnipotent Melody is actually the Saint… except she hasn’t realized it yet.

“Falling in love? Fighting the Demon Lord? More importantly, I’ve got chores to do!”

What will happen to a world whose savior has put her all into being a maid? How does the world cope when its grand script is discarded in favor of menial labor?

Welcome to a fantasy where a single job has upended the cogs of destiny! 
(Novel Updates)

altTitles.en: Dogs Red

description.en:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!

altTitles.th: เรื่องวุ่นๆ กับมนุษย์เหมียวๆ

description.en:
A heartwarming story about the daily lives of a freeter named Yuuya and his two little pets.  
  
Note: Chapters follow the Tankouban (book) order and numbering. The chapter number in (Ex Ch. No.) specifies the original chapter number (when first released on HanaLala Online & MangaPark) before the chapters were compiled into the book.

[Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%AC%E3%81%93%E3%81%A5%E3%81%91!)

altTitles.en: DDDD

altTitles.ja: デッドデッドデーモンズデデデデデストラクション

description.en:
A series about the lives of two high school girls living in Tokyo after aliens have invaded. Dead Dead Demon's Dededededestruction is a self-styled dystopian slice-of-life that reflects on modern societal and political issues in Japan while still maintaining a sense of humor and frivolity.

Large mysterious alien ships have been looming above Japanese towns for three years, filling the sky. Everything changed three years ago. And yet, nothing has changed.

No weapon used against the invaders' ships had any success, beyond destroying part of Japan and leaving its economy in shambles. JSDF is fighting a guerrilla battle against the aliens all over Japan. America is joining the 'war' effort with more aggressive tactics, dividing Japan over the pacifist principle laid out in Article 9 of the Japanese constitution. But this may just be the mundane story of young high schoolers.

"No matter what happens, I won't back down. At least not until this world filled with lies and deceit crumbles away. The real threat to humankind is not invaders, but me."

---
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga** 
- **Won the 25th Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2022**
description.fr:
Depuis 3 ans, le ciel de Tokyo est recouvert par un gigantesque vaisseau spatial extra-terrestre. Pourtant, aucune attaque de la part des extra-terrestres n’est recensée, bien que les humains abattent, avec une facilité déconcertante, les petits vaisseaux qui sortent de temps en temps du ventre de l’immense engin…

Pendant ce temps, sur Terre, les deux amies Kadode et Ôran, comme la majorité des humains, ne prêtent plus attention à ce vaisseau et continuent à vivre leur vie. Mais ces 3 années de paix ont endormi la vigilance de l’Humanité… Elle ne remarque pas que « l’envahisseur » s’est infiltré au sein de sa population. Et il pourrait bientôt troubler leur paisible quotidien !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**

altTitles.en: Auto-Hunting With Clones

description.en:
Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?

29-year-old freeter Ikuta Hiroto is a carefree young man without a love life, regular job, or any real worries about the future. He inherits an old house from the neighbourhood granny, where his 18-year-old cousin, Natsumi moves in with him to study art in Tokyo. This is a story about Hiroto and the people around him who struggle with life.
description.ru: Двадцатидевятилетний работник на полставки Икута Хирото — беззаботный парень, у которого нет ни личной жизни, ни постоянной работы, ни каких-либо беспокойств о собственном будущем. В наследство от соседской бабушки ему достаётся старый дом, куда переезжает его восемнадцатилетняя двоюродная сестра Нацуми, чтобы учиться искусству в Токио. Это история о Хирото и окружающих его людях, которые борются с жизнью.
description.uk: 29-річний Ікута Хірото — безтурботний молодий чоловік без особистого життя, постійної роботи та реальних турбот про майбутнє. Він успадковує старий будинок від сусідської бабусі, куди переїжджає його 18-річна двоюрідна сестра Нацумі, щоб вивчати мистецтво в Токіо. Це історія про Хірото та людей навколо нього, які борються з життям.
description.pt-br: Ikuta Hiroto, de 29 anos, é um jovem despreocupado sem uma vida amorosa, emprego regular ou qualquer preocupação real com o futuro: um "freeter". Ele herda uma velha casa da avó do bairro, onde sua prima de 18 anos, Natsumi, vai morar com ele para estudar arte em Tóquio. Esta é uma história sobre Hiroto e as pessoas ao seu redor que lutam contra a vida.

title.en: I Am the Nanny of the Villain

altTitles.en: I'm the Villainous Male Lead's Terminally Ill Aunt
I am the Terminally Ill Nanny of the Dark Male Lead.

description.en:
She became the nanny of Claude, the blackened male protagonist who would destroy the world. If this continues, she will be killed by the cursed power possessed by the blackened male protagonist. So, she decided to pour out her love for the blackened male protagonist to prevent the blackening.

She also raised the child’s self-esteem, and made the Duke act like a proper father, as fatherly love was essential for the male protagonist’s self-esteem.

She thought the child was gradually recovering his bright face, and the Duke was now learning how to gradually give love to the child.

But she doesn’t know if it’s because she worked too hard….?

“It has always been a problem. You have hundreds of reasons to abandon me, but I don’t have a single one.”

“Nanny will always be by my side, right? That’s why you can’t go. Never, never.”

Two men started obsessing over me.

title.en: Keikenchi Chochiku de Nonbiri Shoushin Ryokou ~Yuusha to Koibito ni Tsuihou sareta Senshi no Mujikaku zama~

altTitles.ja: 経験値貯蓄でのんびり傷心旅行 ～勇者と恋人に追放された戦士の無自覚ざまぁ～

altTitles.en: A Warrior Exiled by the Hero and His Lover

description.en:
After losing his girlfriend to a brave hero, Toru is expelled from his S-Rank party. With a feeling of sadness and pain in his heart, he defeats a demon he meets outside the city, and his ability [to save experience] is broken! Toru becomes level 300 in the blink of an eye! With this power that far surpasses that of heroes, there is nothing that can stop him. Kaede, a slave he met on his journey, forms a group called the "Mangyu Brigade", and easily completes dungeons, acquires the legendary sacred weapons, and thanks to his skills, his friends level up easily! He rescued a countess who was attacked by bandits on the road, and befriended a legendary beast. Oru's journey continues at a leisurely pace, as he repeatedly encounters various people along the way, while his former party of heroes are deprived of opportunities to play an active role and fall into decline. This is the beginning of the life of a 300 level warrior!  


---

[Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9483ge/)

title.en: I Stole the First Ranker’s Soul

altTitles.en: I Stole the Number One Ranker's Soul

description.en:
One day, Son Mo-Ah fell into a dungeon and became a gathering hunter.
Son Mo-Ah, who somehow narrowly escaped death, was going to live a normal life but gets caught up in a dungeon yet again.
In a moment of crisis, she is rescued by Seo Ji-Han, the number one ranker, and succeeds in surviving the situation. Somehow, Son Mo-Ah got entangled in a fateful relationship with said number one ranker.

But he said something really unusual to me.

“Promise me that you will kill all the dungeons bosses in this world, as many as you can.”

What?

title.en: Isekai Yurutto Survival Seikatsu: Gakkou no Minna to Isekai no Mujintou ni Tenishitakedo Ore Dake Rakushou desu

altTitles.en: Survival Life in a Different World: I Moved to an Uninhabited Island in a Different World With Everyone at School, but I’m the Only One Who Wins Easily

altTitles.ja: 異世界ゆるっとサバイバル生活 ～学校の皆と異世界の無人島に転移したけど俺だけ楽勝です～

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界悠閒荒野求生~和學校的眾人一起傳送到了無人島但是僅自己遊刃有餘~

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Yuru tto Survival Seikatsu ~ Gakkō no Mina to Isekai no Mujintō ni Ten'i Shitakedo Ore Dake Rakushōdesu ~

altTitles.zh: 异世界悠闲荒野求生～和学校的众人一起传送到了无人岛但是只有我游刃有余～

altTitles.ko: 이세계 느긋 서바이벌 생활 ~학교 모두와 이세계의 무인도로 전이했지만 나만 낙승입니다~

description.en:
I’m Shinomiya Hokage, a 3rd-year high-school boy who dreams of a survival life. One day, everyone in my school transferred to a mysterious island in a parallel world. I woke up in an unknown cave and I started moving on my own. Then, I met up with some of my classmates. My knowledge and tools in survival shines through. I was a plain guy in school but I’m the leader in this world.  
  


---
description.es:
Soy Shinomiya Hokage, un chico de tercer año de preparatoria que sueña con una vida de supervivencia. Un día, todos en mi escuela se trasladaron a una isla misteriosa en un mundo paralelo. Me desperté en una cueva desconocida y empecé a moverme por mi cuenta. Entonces, me encontré con algunos de mis compañeros de clase. Mis conocimientos y herramientas de supervivencia destacan. Yo era un chico sencillo en la escuela, pero soy el líder en este mundo.  
  


---
description.pt:
Eu sou Shinomiya Hokage, um garoto do terceiro ano do ensino médio que sonha com uma vida de sobrevivência. Um dia, todos na minha escola foram transferidos para uma ilha misteriosa em um mundo paralelo. Acordei em uma caverna desconhecida e comecei a explorar sozinho. Então, encontrei algumas das minhas colegas. Meu conhecimento e ferramentas de sobrevivência se destacam. Eu era um menino simples na escola, mas sou o líder neste mundo.  
  


---

**Monthly serialization / Serialización mensual.**  
  
- [Alternative Raw Source](https://rawmangas.net/manga/isekai-yurutto-survival-seikatsu-gakkou-no-minna-to-isekai-no-mujintou-ni-tenishitakedo-ore-dake-rakushou-desu-manga-raw/)
description.pt-br: Eu sou Shinomiya Hokage, um garoto do terceiro ano do ensino médio que sonha com uma vida de sobrevivência. Um dia, todos na minha escola foram transferidos para uma ilha misteriosa em um mundo paralelo. Acordei em uma caverna desconhecida e comecei a explorar sozinho. Então, encontrei algumas das minhas colegas. Meu conhecimento e ferramentas de sobrevivência se destacam. Eu era um menino simples na escola, mas sou o líder neste mundo.

title.en: Luo Zhi Yongzhe - Yi Shijie Luchu Da Maoxian

altTitles.en: Naked Hero - An Exposed Adventure in Another World

altTitles.zh-hk: 裸之勇者-異世界露出大冒險

description.en:
A third-year high school girl wakes up in another world. But she's naked!
Let’s go on a nude adventure in another world!

title.en: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.ja: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん

altTitles.ru: Аля, которая сидит рядом со мной, иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски
Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.vi: Arya-san bàn bên thi thoảng lại trêu ghẹo tôi bằng tiếng Nga

altTitles.zh-hk: 不時輕聲地以俄語遮羞的鄰座艾莉同學

altTitles.id: Alya-san Terkadang Menyembunyikan Perasaannya dalam Bahasa Rusia

altTitles.pt-br: Alya-san geralmente esconde seus sentimentos em russo

altTitles.ne: आल्या कहिलेकाहीँ रूसी भाषामा आफ्नो भावना लुकाउँछिन्

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

altTitles.en: Alya-san Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

description.en: Masachika Kuze sits next to Alya, a girl of Russian and Japanese descent. She’s beautiful, haughty, and an exceptional student, while Masachika is nerdy and known for being a slacker. He’s an easy target for her comments in Russian, which she’s all too happy to translate—except he can understand what she’s really saying!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

title.en: Gendai no Saikyou Heishi, Isekai Dungeon o Kouryaku Suru

altTitles.ja: 現代の最強兵士、異世界ダンジョンを攻略する

altTitles.en: The Modern Era's Strongest Soldier Conquers Another World's Dungeon

description.en: Hasumi Ryuuji, the man called “the modern era’s strongest soldier”, someone who can make numerous difficult strategies a success, was transferred during a mission into the depths of another world’s dungeon. A “heavenly voice” echoed inside his brain guiding him — “Welcome, the hero from another world” — as he encounters a scene in which adventurers are being attacked by monsters. However, making good use of his superior physical abilities, discernment, and hand-to-hand combat abilities, he succeeds in easily making quick work of the monsters. In this other world, where adventurers are existences weaker than monsters, Hasumi, who can suppress his target even with just a knife, was someone regarded as a hero due to his outstanding abilities. Hasumi decides to cooperate with the adventurers he rescued, but they are attacked by a dragon, falling into a critical situation. Nevertheless, he leads his flustered comrades, coordinate them and makes an attack opportunity to appear. Moreover, after he summons modern firearms with a “weapon summoning” item, he kills the dragon in one shot by accurately targeting its weak spot. In front of this man’s tempered body and intellect, someone who is asked “Who the heck are you?” answers “I’m just a soldier”, even the mythical-grade dungeon is not a threat?! The curtain rises for the story of an ex-special forces soldier turned adventurer challenging another world!

altTitles.en: Mysterious Mayuri-san

description.en:
Yuusuke, a 7th grader, is interested in his friend's older sister for various reasons.
The older sister, while a little strange, is a kind and caring girl.
She's mysterious but is popular with everyone.  
This is an ordinary comedy about Mayuri-san's mysterious everyday life.

altTitles.en: Academy’s Genius Swordmaster

description.en:
Following a momentous battle against giants for the fate of the world, Ronan emerges victorious as the last man standing of the Imperial Army. As he laments this hollow victory with his dying commander, Grand Marshal Adeshan, they quickly learn that the war is far from over and an overwhelming force of giants descends from the heavens.

Fearing the worst, yet seeing hope in the courageous Ronan, Adeshan uses her last time slip to send him back to the past, so that he can enroll in the prestigious Phileon Academy and become the strongest swordsman the empire has ever seen!

altTitles.en: Hero, Returns

description.en:
The strongest hero of humanity, Kim Sung Bin.

He threw everything on the line and fought… but he still couldn’t prevent the destruction of the world.

However, his legend has just begun as he returns 20 years into the past.

“I’ll definitely… kill it this time.”

Now fully equipped with overwhelming power and experience, the hero’s raid isn’t over yet!
description.ko:
인류 최강의 영웅, 김성인
모든 것을 내던지며 분투했지만
결국…… 세상의 멸망은 막지 못했다

하지만 그의 전설은 이제 시작이었으니
성인, 20년 전으로 회귀하다!

“이번에는…… 반드시 잡는다.”

압도적인 재능과 경험으로 무장한 완전체
영웅의 레이드는 아직 끝나지 않았다!
description.ru: Сильнейший герой человечества Ким Сон Бин. Он бросил все на кон и сражался, но… не cмог предотвратить разрушение мира. Однако его легенда только начинается, когда Сон Бин возвращается на 20 лет в прошлое.
description.pt-br:
O herói mais forte da humanidade, Kim Sung Bin.

Ele jogou tudo na linha e lutou... mas ele ainda não conseguiu impedir a destruição do mundo.

No entanto, sua lenda apenas começou quando ele retorna 20 anos no passado.

"Com certeza... vou matá-lo desta vez."

Agora totalmente equipado com poder e experiência esmagadores, o ataque do herói ainda não acabou!

altTitles.ja: 搾り取らないで、女商人さん

altTitles.en: Please Don’t Milk Me, Merchant-san!!

description.en:
Tartaros: A mysterious and massive underground dungeon. There, adventurers are engaged in a night and day struggle to find the treasure they seek. Lavi the New Adventurer is taking on the challenge of Tartaros, but has a problem. A renowned dark merchant, Philo the Beastkin, is pestering him to buy her strange items! She pushes items (often erotic) onto Lavi for him to use in every situation they come across. 

What will become of Lavi’s adventures?! Is he willing to buy anything from this adorably annoying merchant girl?!   

This is a fantasy comic with a teasing merchant!!
description.es:
el Misterioso laberinto subterráneo gigante "Tartaros".   
  
Allí, los aventureros de día y de noche se aventuran en  
buscan tesoros y otras riquezas. El aventurero novato Lavi (shota) que desafió el calabozo "tartaros" y que para su mala suerte se mete en algunos problemas, Es en ese instante cuando conoció a la mitad bestia Philo (ponkotsu), con quien hace un trato para ser su cliente habitual.  
¿Qué pasará con la aventura de Lavi? ¡seguirá Comprándole ítem   
a esta belleza y hermosa!  
  
¡¡¡la comedia de fantasía sobre el aventurero novato Lavi (shota)   
y la comerciante mitad bestia Philo (ponkotsu)!!

altTitles.en: Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan
The Youngest Son of a Renowned Family of Swordsmen
Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan
Swordmaster's Youngest Son

altTitles.es-la: El hijo menor del maestro de la espada

description.en:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)
description.ko:
진 룬칸델
대륙 최고의 검술명가, 룬칸델의 막내아들
룬칸델 역사상 최악의 둔재

비참하게 쫓겨나 허무한 최후를 맞이한 그에게
다시 한 번 기회가 주어졌다.

“너는 이 힘을 어떻게 사용하고 싶더냐?”
“저를 위해 사용하고 싶습니다.”

전생의 기억과 압도적인 재능, 그리고 신과의 계약

최강이 될 준비는 끝났다.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)

description.en: Nothing can be explained, strive to the unknown. Lostworks is an isekai thriller with a heavy focus on action and mystery. If you want a more mature story, one that escapes the saturation of the genre and that deals with philosophical questions and dark topics, I believe you should give it a try.
